definitions.definition: The act of criticising ; a critical judgment passed or expressed
examples: The politician received a lot of public criticism for his controversial stance on the issue.

definitions.definition: A critical observation or detailed examination and review.
examples: The politician received several detailed criticisms of his stance on the issue.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The act of criticising ; a critical judgment passed or expressed
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A critical observation or detailed examination and review.
